name: 挑战立方VR(Challenge Cube VR)
description:
In the stage full of hustle and bustle ,in the eyes of many viewers, you will complete a series of bizarre challenges! Make full use of your wisdom and skill, be the top of the ranking list!

* Bizarre challenges:
Exchange
Speed
Memory
Accurate
Classification
Grab
Confusion
Place
...
* Whimsical auxiliary cards
Exchange card
Double card
Chance card

Tip: Hold the trigger button and close to hold things!
The game will automatically switch language according to the operating system language！
